Top
Fields
  NameDescription
CoreNewLine
Stores the new line characters used for this TextWriter.
(Inherited from TextWriter.)
Top
Remarks

A StringWriter that can be Reset(Int32, Int32) and reused. This uses a single buffer for string operations.

See Also

Reference
